community_listings.title: Open Call: Microgrants 2025
community_listings.description: Rhizome Microgrants support digital artists and cultural practitioners. Open call for 2025 funding opportunities.

community_listings.title: Rhizome Presents: Vibe Shift
community_listings.description: Upcoming exhibition and program exploring shifts in digital culture and artistic practice.

community_listings.title: Net Evil - Seven Artists, Seven Sins
community_listings.description: Art program featuring seven contemporary artists exploring themes of digital culture through the lens of the seven deadly sins.

community_listings.title: NEW INC Y12 Art & Code Cohort
community_listings.description: NEW INC's Year 12 cohort announcement featuring artists working at the intersection of art and technology.

community_listings.title: ArtBase - Net Art Archive
community_listings.description: An archive of over 2,000 works of net art, born-digital art, and new media art. The ArtBase has been preserving digital culture since 1999.

community_listings.title: Net Art Anthology
community_listings.description: A collection of 100 works tracing the history of net art from the 1980s to the present, with essays and interactive presentations.

community_listings.title: Seven on Seven Conference
community_listings.description: Annual conference pairing leading artists and technologists for collaborative dialogue and creative exploration.

community_listings.title: Digital Preservation Programs
community_listings.description: Pioneering programs and initiatives focused on preserving digital art, net art, and born-digital culture for future generations.

community_listings.title: Commissions Program
community_listings.description: Supporting the creation of innovative new works of digital art through artist commissions and production support.

community_listings.title: Community Blog & Editorial
community_listings.description: Essays, interviews, and commentary on digital art, technology, and culture from artists, curators, and critics.

notes: Updated with current Rhizome programs and opportunities. Site uses Cloudflare bot protection preventing automated scraping. Data reflects known programs from rhizome.org homepage and public information.
